hymn.title: I Love God! He Put the Fish in the Sea

layout.singingstanza: I love God! He put the fish in the sea, He put the leaves on the trees, And the birds in the air, so free!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2013 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: I love God! He put the fish in the sea, He put the leaves on the trees, And the birds in the air, so free!
I love God! And I think you'll agree: That He perfectly placed me In my family!
